sources.title: Man of the Moment
sources.description: Title: Man of the Moment Summary: Civil Servant Norman becomes the favourite of the rulers of a South Seas island that the British have an interest in. Directed by: John Paddy Carstairs Actors: Norman Wisdom, Lana Morris, Belinda Lee Production Company: J. Arthur Rank Organisation Release Date: 24 November 1955 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 Civil Servant Norman becomes the favourite of the rulers of a South Seas island that the British have an interest in.
